wikipedia_page.main: Atique Islam Choudhury (Bengali: আতিকুল ইসলাম চৌধুরী; born 5 May 1963) is an English restaurateur and chef.

response: * Atique Choudhury – Businessman whose restaurant Yum Yum is Europe's largest Thai restaurant.
* Atique Choudhury (born 1963), English restaurateur and chef
* Atique Choudhury – restaurateur; his restaurant Yum Yum won Best Thai Restaurant in London at the 2012 Asian Curry Awards
